about_the_game:
The Goddess of Delusion has issued you a perilous invitation: win the game, and you’ll rescue your imprisoned companions; fail, and your freedom will be stripped away, turning you into her puppet. Do you dare to take on this gamble of freedom and redemption?

Cubic Cosmos offers an innovative roguelike deck-building experience. With its drop-style tower defense mechanics and fast-paced combat, the game challenges your strategy and wits to their limits.

Face the Choices of Fate

Engage in battles or explore random events—every decision could change your destiny:

  • 200+ cards and dozens of playstyle synergies to discover.

  • 50+ relics, each crucial to creating powerful builds.

  • 50+ random events to encounter.

  • Unlock 10+ heroes, each with unique abilities, by conquering dungeons.

Endless Builds and Permanent Growth

Experiment with card and relic combinations to enjoy endless strategies and builds:

  • Diverse playstyles: Auto builds, Big Unit builds, Spell builds, Summoning builds, Transfer builds, Shield builds, Shard builds, Treasure builds, Sacrifice builds, Resonance builds, and more. The possibilities are endless!

  • Permanent growth: Cards can gain permanent stat upgrades through various means. Even the lowest-tier cards can grow into powerful units through continued development.

  • Chain reactions: Many cards feature unique effects that can trigger intricate synergies, creating epic skill chains that feel like a cinematic spectacle!

Shared Challenges and Glory

Record and share your battles to claim the glory of the leaderboard:

  • Battle records: Extract battle codes or dungeon seeds to share epic moments and revisit memorable matches!

  • Leaderboards: The more exciting your battles, the more likes you’ll earn, climbing the ranks for ultimate recognition.

  • Friend support: Share battle codes with friends to seek help or provide assistance. Progress is automatically synced after completion—showcase your skills and camaraderie!

short_description: Cubic Cosmos is a fast-paced roguelike deckbuilder featuring a unique drop-style tower defense mechanic. Upgrade your cards, build powerful synergies, unlock heroes, encounter random events, and battle against bizarre relic creatures. Every step shapes your one-of-a-kind journey!
